trans-unit.source: Represents the duration of time that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> is active.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 作用中的持續時間。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
\<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/>
\- or -
\<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
\<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>"/>

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *days*
A value greater than or equal to 0 that describes the number of days spanned by this duration.
trans-unit.target: 值大於或等於 0，描述這個持續時間跨越的天數。

trans-unit.source: *hours*
trans-unit.target: *小時*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 23 that represents the number of hours spanned by this duration.
trans-unit.target: 值介於 0 到 23 之間，表示這個持續時間跨越的時數。

trans-unit.source: *minutes*
trans-unit.target: *分鐘*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of minutes spanned by this duration.
trans-unit.target: 表示的值介於 0 到 59 之間的這段期間所擴展的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: *seconds*
trans-unit.target: *seconds*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of seconds spanned by this duration
trans-unit.target: 介於 0 到 59 之間的值，表示這個持續時間跨越的秒數

trans-unit.source: *fractionalSeconds*
trans-unit.target: *fractionalSeconds*

trans-unit.source: A value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that represents fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: 值包含 1 到 7 位數字，代表小數秒數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the initial time interval of this duration.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個持續期間的初始時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> structure with the supplied <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 結構的新執行個體 (Instance)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="timeSpan" /> is initialized to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 當 <paramref name="timeSpan" /> 初始化為負值時發生。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> that represents the value of the current instance plus <c>duration</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體，表示目前執行個體的值加上 <c>duration</c>。

trans-unit.source: Adds the value of the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to the value of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 之指定的執行個體值加入至目前的執行個體值。

trans-unit.source: If both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have values, an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> that represents the combined values.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的兩個執行個體都有值，則為表示組合值之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法就會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> value that is automatically determined.
trans-unit.target: 取得自動決定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> initialized to an automatic value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化為自動值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *property*
trans-unit.target: *屬性*

trans-unit.source: A property that accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Duration> value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性，可以接受<xref:System.Windows.Duration>值。

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Compares one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> value to another.
trans-unit.target: 將一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 值與另一個值比較。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> is less than <paramref name="t2" />, a negative value that represents the difference.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="t1" /> 小於 <paramref name="t2" />，則為表示差異的負值。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> is equal to <paramref name="t2" />, zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="t1" /> 等於 <paramref name="t2" />，則為零。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> is greater than <paramref name="t2" />, a positive value that represents the difference.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="t1" /> 大於 <paramref name="t2" />，則為表示差異的正值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration> instances with a property value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> are a special case with the following return values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration> 執行個體的屬性值與<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>是特殊案例具有以下的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: If `t1` is Automatic and `t2` is not, -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`t1`為 [自動] 並`t2`是不是，則傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: If `t1` is Automatic and `t2` is also Automatic, 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`t1`為 [自動] 並`t2`也會自動進行，就會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: If `t1` is not Automatic and `t2` is Automatic, 1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`t1`不會自動和`t2`是自動執行，則傳回 1。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a specified object is equal to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的物件是否等於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Object to check for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查是否相等的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified object is equal to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if value is equal to the current instance of Duration; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果值等於目前持續期間的執行個體則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to check for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查是否相等之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is equal to this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 是否等於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="duration" /> is equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="duration" /> 等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: First instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的兩個執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="t1" /> is equal to <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 等於 <paramref name="t1" />，則為 <paramref name="t2" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> value that represents an infinite interval.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 值，這個值表示無限間隔。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> initialized to a forever value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化為永久值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *property*
trans-unit.target: *屬性*

trans-unit.source: A property that accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Duration> value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性，可以接受<xref:System.Windows.Duration>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A signed 32-bit integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號 32 位元整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> represents a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 是否表示 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: True if this Duration is a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個持續時間為 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值則為 true，否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的第一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的第二個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Adds two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> together.
trans-unit.target: 同時加入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的兩個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> values, this method returns the sum of those two values.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的兩個執行個體都有 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值，則這個方法會傳回那兩個值的總和。

trans-unit.source: If either value is set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />, the method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中一個值設定為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />，則方法會傳回 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />。

trans-unit.source: If either value is set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />, the method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中一個值設定為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />，則方法會傳回 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />。

trans-unit.source: If either <paramref name="t1" /> or <paramref name="t2" /> has no value, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="t1" /> 或 <paramref name="t2" /> 沒有值，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Add%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Add%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的兩個執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have values and are equal, or if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的兩個執行個體都有值且相等，或者 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的兩個執行個體都是 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法就會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Equals%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Equals%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines if one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is greater than another.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的一個執行個體是否大於另一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is greater than <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="t1" /> 和 <paramref name="t2" /> 都有值且 <paramref name="t1" /> 大於 <paramref name="t2" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> 會被視為大於任何有限值。

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 與任何比較<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>值傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is greater than or equal to another instance.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的一個執行個體是否大於或等於另一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is greater than or equal to <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="t1" /> 和 <paramref name="t2" /> 都有值且 <paramref name="t1" /> 大於或等於 <paramref name="t2" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> 會被視為大於任何有限值。

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 與任何比較<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>值傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> from which an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is implicitly created.
trans-unit.target: 用來隱含地建立 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />。

trans-unit.source: Implicitly creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 隱含地建立 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.%23ctor%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Duration.%23ctor%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 是負值時發生。

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的兩個執行個體是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if exactly one of <paramref name="t1" /> or <paramref name="t2" /> represent a value, or if they both represent values that are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果恰好 <paramref name="t1" /> 或 <paramref name="t2" /> 其中一個代表值，或它們代表不相等的值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the value of one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is less than the value of another instance.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的一個執行個體值是否小於另一個執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is less than <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="t1" /> 和 <paramref name="t2" /> 都有值且 <paramref name="t1" /> 小於 <paramref name="t2" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> 會被視為大於任何有限值。

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 與任何比較<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>值傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 所要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the value of one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is less than or equal to the value of another instance.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的一個執行個體值是否小於或等於另一個執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is less than or equal to <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="t1" /> 和 <paramref name="t2" /> 都有值且 <paramref name="t1" /> 小於或等於 <paramref name="t2" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> 會被視為大於任何有限值。

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 與任何比較<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>值傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的第一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to subtract.
trans-unit.target: 要減去之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the value of one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> from another.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的一個執行個體值減去另一個執行個體值。

trans-unit.source: If both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have values, an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> that represents the value of <paramref name="t1" /> minus <paramref name="t2" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的兩個執行個體都有值，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體，表示 <paramref name="t1" /> 值減去 <paramref name="t2" />。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> has a value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> has a value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan" />, this method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="t1" /> 的值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />，並且 <paramref name="t2" /> 的值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan" />，則這個方法會傳回 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法就會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following calculations all return a value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列所有的計算傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> 減<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> 減<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> 減<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> 減<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> 減<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> 減<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> 減<xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Subtract%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Subtract%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的指定執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Plus%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Plus%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的指定執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to subtract from the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 要從目前執行個體減去之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the value of the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> from this instance.
trans-unit.target: 從這個執行個體中減去 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 之指定執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> whose value is the result of this instance minus the value of <paramref name="duration" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的新執行個體，其值為這個執行個體減去 <paramref name="duration" /> 值的結果。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 表示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 表示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Converts an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 的執行個體轉換成 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 之這個執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 表示。
